name: Bloody Mary - Scary Horror Game With Red Creature
name_original: Bloody Mary - Scary Horror Game With Red Creature
description:
Are you ready to beat Bloody Mary & Red Creature?

Do you have dare to leave their house?

If your answer is yes then you must play Bloody Mary - Scary Horror Game With Red Creature Game?

This is very simple horror game (Actually Not). The task is very simple, you just need to leave the house, to do that, you need to solve some puzzles, find some keys and some more things. Looks simple?

Well it's not that simple because Bloody Mary & Red Creature are there. They are always ready to kill you as soon as they find you. So you have to survive and solve those puzzles and leave their horror house. In this horror game You only have 5 days to do that. After those 5 days, it's over. You have to start again.
